statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

article.description: Jarvis Garrett scored 18 points, Four McGlynn added 14 and the duo combined to make eight 3-pointers to help Rhode Island beat Richmond 77-65 on Tuesday night.

video.headline: F. McGlynn made Three Point Jumper.

video.description: 1H (16:53) URI Four McGlynn made Three Point Jumper.
video.title: F. McGlynn made Three Point Jumper.

article.headline: Rhode Island uses hot 3-point shooting to top Richmond 77-65

images.name: F. McGlynn made Three Point Jumper.
images.caption: 1H (16:53) URI Four McGlynn made Three Point Jumper.

article.linkText: Rhode Island uses hot 3-point shooting to top Richmond 77-65
article.story: KINGSTON, R.I. -- Jarvis Garrett scored 18 points, Four McGlynn added 14 and the duo combined to make eight 3-pointers to help Rhode Island beat Richmond 77-65 on Tuesday night. Rhode Island hit its first eight 3-pointers -- with makes from five players -- to build a 29-18 lead. The Rams extended their lead to 41-32 at halftime after eight of their 15 made field goals were from 3-point range. T.J. Cline kept Richmond in it with 16 points in the first half and Terry Allen added 11. Cline only missed one of his eight field-goal attempts as the Spiders made 50 percent of their shots before half. McGlynn's floater and 3-pointer on consecutive possessions extended Rhode Island's lead to 64-47 with eight minutes left. Jared Terrell added 18 points for Rhode Island (10-5, 2-0 Atlantic 10). Cline led Richmond (8-6, 0-2) with 28 points and Allen reached double-figure scoring for the 24th straight game with 19 points.
